testimonialsList.text: Bir√ßok platformla √ßalƒ±≈ütƒ±k fakat JobsAdmire farklƒ±. ƒ∞≈ûKUR ruhsatƒ± ile yasal olarak g√ºvenilir, belgeleri d√ºzenleme konusunda destek√ßi ve tamamen ≈üeffaf √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±yorlar. ƒ∞≈üe alƒ±m ihtiya√ßlarƒ±mƒ±zƒ± g√∂n√ºl rahatlƒ±ƒüƒ±yla onlara devrediyoruz

header.title: Our Professional Services
header.description: From career planning to global placement, we provide end-to-end professional services designed to accelerate your career growth and open doors to international opportunities.

resumeWriting.title: Professional Resume Writing
resumeWriting.subtitle: ATS-Optimized Career Documents
resumeWriting.description: Transform your career story with professionally crafted resumes that bypass automated systems and capture recruiters' attention. Our expert writers understand what hiring managers across 80+ industries look for, ensuring your resume opens doors to opportunities.

globalJobPlacement.title: Global Job Placement
globalJobPlacement.subtitle: International Career Opportunities
globalJobPlacement.description: Connect with top global employers through our extensive international network. We match skilled professionals with overseas opportunities, providing comprehensive support from application to placement in your dream destination.

interviewCoaching.title: Interview Coaching
interviewCoaching.subtitle: Master Any Interview Format
interviewCoaching.description: Build unshakeable confidence with personalized interview coaching from industry experts. Practice with mock interviews, receive detailed feedback, and learn proven strategies to excel in behavioral, technical, and executive interviews.

careerCounselling.title: Career Counselling
careerCounselling.subtitle: Strategic Career Development
careerCounselling.description: Discover your ideal career path with comprehensive assessment tools and expert guidance. Our certified counselors help you align your strengths, interests, and goals to make informed decisions about your professional future.

visaSupport.title: Visa Support Services
visaSupport.subtitle: Seamless Immigration Process
visaSupport.description: Navigate complex visa applications with expert guidance and comprehensive documentation support. Our immigration specialists ensure your applications meet all requirements for work, study, or permanent residency visas worldwide.

skillDevelopment.title: Skill Development Training
skillDevelopment.subtitle: Industry-Ready Professional Skills
skillDevelopment.description: Advance your career with practical, job-oriented training programs designed by industry experts. From technical skills to soft skills, our comprehensive courses prepare you for today's competitive job market with hands-on learning.

remoteWork.title: Remote Work Opportunities
remoteWork.subtitle: Global Remote Career Access
remoteWork.description: Unlock the freedom of remote work with curated opportunities from verified global employers. We connect talented professionals with legitimate remote positions across multiple industries, enabling work-life balance and international earning potential.

talentAcquisition.title: Talent Acquisition
talentAcquisition.subtitle: Strategic Hiring Solutions
talentAcquisition.description: Streamline your recruitment process with our comprehensive talent acquisition services. We help organizations attract, assess, and hire top-quality candidates efficiently through systematic processes and innovative sourcing techniques.

immigrationConsultation.title: Immigration Consultation
immigrationConsultation.subtitle: Complete Relocation Support
immigrationConsultation.description: Transform your life with comprehensive immigration assistance for permanent residency and global relocation. Our certified consultants provide personalized strategies and complete documentation support for skilled worker programs worldwide.

jobRecruitment.title: Job Recruitment Services
jobRecruitment.subtitle: Professional Recruitment Solutions
jobRecruitment.description: Connect with your next career opportunity through our comprehensive job recruitment platform. We bridge the gap between talented professionals and leading employers, offering personalized job matching and recruitment support across diverse industries.

targetedRecruitment.title: Targeted Recruitment
targetedRecruitment.description: Precise matching of candidates to job requirements.

performanceTracking.title: Performance Tracking
performanceTracking.description: Advanced metrics to measure recruitment success.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Thorough vetting of all candidates before presentation.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: JobsAdmire is an independent immigration consultancy. We are not affiliated with or endorsed by any government authority. We do not issue visas or residence permits; we only provide consultation and assistance.
